aidStatInfoDescription: The AIDSTAT project aims to create a monitoring system for investments and government expenditures in the Kyrgyz Republic. By using digital technologies, the project will ensure transparency and efficiency in public financial management. AIDSTAT will allow tracking investment processes in real-time, improving control over spending, and supporting informed decision-making. The goal is to increase accountability and provide citizens with access to information about government investments.
partnersPageDescription: This section provides information about projects and programs supported by donors, as well as their impact on the economic and social progress of the country.
projectsPageDescription: Explore our projects, learn about their goals, implementation stages, and impact on society. Let's make Kyrgyzstan even better together!
mainPageText: Monitoring of projects for the creation and development of Kyrgyzstan's infrastructure
mainPageDescription: Up-to-date information on projects, funding, and implementation
